get.summary:
Lists all invoices for the account identified by the given ID.
Required permissions:
- read:payment_information

parameters.name: accountId
parameters.description:
The identifier of the account (in GUID format).
This is a required field.

id.description:
Unique identifier for the invoice.

TODO: Is this a GUID?

number.description:
Optional invoice unique identifier. It appears on emails sent to the
customer for this invoice.

totalAmount.description:
Total invoice amount.

TODO: can this be a negative number (credit invoice, if not we should add: [(buf.validate.field).int64.gte = 0])

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the invoice was created.

status.description: The current status of the invoice.

pdfUrl.description:
The URL to download the PDF for the invoice. If the invoice has not been
finalized yet, this will be null.

v1Invoice.description: Invoice represents a billing invoice issued to an account.

v1InvoiceStatus.description:
The possible status of an invoice.

 - INVOICE_STATUS_UNSPECIFIED: Unspecified
 - INVOICE_STATUS_DRAFT: Draft
 - INVOICE_STATUS_OPEN: Open
 - INVOICE_STATUS_VOID: Void
 - INVOICE_STATUS_PAID: Paid
 - INVOICE_STATUS_UNCOLLECTIBLE: Uncollectible

v1ListInvoicesResponse.title: ListInvoicesResponse is the response from the ListInvoices function
